note: Generally an interested, curious person. Product manager in media technology. Worked at Dolby Labs (helped bring consumer Atmos to the world), Audinate (Dante software), and FlamingoAi (a pre-ChatGPT chat bot for commerce). Did lots on spatial audio, ambisonics, Pure Data and experimental electronic music for ages. Enjoy Eurorack synthesis and exploring random technological or cultural rabbit holes. Love a walk in nature and a good cook. First Mastodon account in Nov 2022 on instance that closed
